Title: Object: Subterranean church of Bethlehem
Series: Views in Egypt, Palestine and other parts of the Ottoman Empire
Description: Plate 21 in volume II: prayers entering the church through steps in the left background, people praying in front of an altar on the left, and another behind six candles in a back chamber in the right background; lanterns hung from the ceiling in front of the altars; after Mayer; published state. 1803 Hand-coloured aquatint with etching
Bibliographic references: Abbey Travel / Travel in Aquatint and lithography 1770-1860 from the library of J.R.Abbey (369.II.21)
